name: Cleverly Crafted Contraption: Born in Blessed Bitterness
description: A complex scale metal model that is a replica of the marvelous tool used to analyze and upgrade alchemical ingredients. This device is designed to extract active elements from constituent alchemical ingredients and use these elements to enhance ingredients of the same sort.\nRumor has it that this device was inspired by a device used to extract coffee concentrate. However, to increase the success rate of the related research and analysis, its structure is more sophisticated than that of the original, as are the materials used. According to a certain alchemist, it can help to "eliminate the influence of confusing variables that crop up during analysis conducted by experimental equipment."
